body_html: The problem is about the nan steps. In the backprop, after boolean_mask, zeros are used as gradients to continue the back propagation. It could get to an op whose gradient uses some nans produced in the forward.
body_text: The problem is about the nan steps. In the backprop, after boolean_mask, zeros are used as gradients to continue the back propagation. It could get to an op whose gradient uses some nans produced in the forward.
body: The problem is about the nan steps. In the backprop, after boolean_mask, zeros are used as gradients to continue the back propagation. It could get to an op whose gradient uses some nans produced in the forward.
